techs.name: Torch
techs.quote: This is similar to survivors on the Island waking up naked on a sandy beach.

techs.name: Waterskin
techs.quote: Also it works as a filter.

techs.name: Spyglass
techs.quote: Over there and over the hills!

techs.name: Raft
uniques: Enables [Embarked] units to enter ocean tiles

techs.name: Spike Wall
techs.quote: There is a zombie on my lawn.

techs.name: Smithy
techs.quote: Workplace full of anvils and hammers.

techs.name: Tranq Arrow
techs.quote: This will make that beast asleep!

techs.name: Fabricator
techs.quote: A huge machine powered by gasoil

techs.name: Polymer
techs.quote: Normally found on baby penguins, but this time is going to be artificial.

techs.name: GPS
techs.quote: Location device used by the survivors.

techs.name: Cryopod
techs.quote: Used as a pokeball for big dinosaurs.

techs.name: Canteen
techs.quote: Used to save water on dry places.

techs.name: Radio
techs.quote: A tech used to mantain comunications.

techs.name: Chain Bola
techs.quote: A weapon used to immobilize big creatures.

techs.name: Assault Riffle
techs.quote: The same report says the Terran Federation wanted to use a new dark energy source.

techs.name: Flamethrower
techs.quote: A story about an underground explorer finding a culture of creatures called the Vril-Ya that has a society that runs on Vril, an alI-permeating fluid that the Vril-Ya can control with their minds. - Edward Bulwer-Lytton

techs.name: Auto Torret
techs.quote: Depicts a now prevalent observation that machines are taking over more and more of man's roles in society and man becoming slaves to those machines.

techs.name: Defeat Broodmother
techs.quote: Helena noted that she doesn't know how much time has passed ever since she has ascended. Where a typical person lives a day, her ability to see and experience entire time streams as singular moments may have allowed Helena's human mind to live millions of millennia in a single day.

techs.name: Defeat the Dragon
techs.quote: Helena noted that she doesn't know how much time has passed ever since she has ascended. Where a typical person lives a day, her ability to see and experience entire time streams as singular moments may have allowed Helena's human mind to live millions of millennia in a single day.

techs.name: Defeat Megapithecus
techs.quote: Helena noted that she doesn't know how much time has passed ever since she has ascended. Where a typical person lives a day, her ability to see and experience entire time streams as singular moments may have allowed Helena's human mind to live millions of millennia in a single day.

techs.name: Element Dust
techs.quote: It's incredible, really. They simply place an implant harvested from the animal inside an advanced structure called a Revival Platform, then add a what they call ancient amber. The result is a perfect clone of the original creature, right down to its personality. In other words, if it's been tamed then it will remain obedient, and vice versa if it was wild.

techs.name: Resource Attractor
techs.quote: I plan to follow up by studying these implants and samples of amber...and also burning these clothes. I'll never be able to get this swampy stench out of them. Ugh.

techs.name: Tek Sword
techs.quote: It's been a while since my last entry, hasn't it? Between all that happened with Rockwell back on the station and the shock of arriving planetside, I've been in a bit of a rut. Even cataloguing the new species I've found has done little to ease my mind.

techs.name: Tek Shield
techs.quote: Luckily, Santiago's plans have given us all something to do. I'm hardly an ace with technology, much less giant bloody robots, but after all that's happened, I owe it to these people to lend a hand in whatever way I can.

techs.name: Tek Turret
techs.quote: It's hard to believe that this is actually Earth, but the proof Santiago provided is undeniable. The lack of night is disconcerting though, unless you really enjoy apocalyptic events. Could the Earth's rotation have slowed down, or worse, stopped entirely?.

techs.name: Shield Generator
techs.quote: No, that's rubbish. With the atmosphere out of control, all those abandoned buildings would have been decimated by wind and those giant creatures would never survive the shifting oceans, extreme temperatures and weakened magnetic field. Yet, if all those space stations above us could somehow form a magnetic barrier and repair the atmosphere...well anything's possible at this point.

techs.name: Tek Armor
techs.quote: I had a talk with Santiago today. A real one I mean, not the sarcastic banter that's his preferred method of communication. I was pretty surprised, I didn't think that had an off switch.

techs.name: Tek Forcefield
techs.quote: Helena noted that she doesn't know how much time has passed ever since she has ascended. Where a typical person lives a day, her ability to see and experience entire time streams as singular moments may have allowed Helena's human mind to live millions of millennia in a single day.
